did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence between Spreiregen and Hans Blumenfeld, concerning publication of Blumenfeld's writings by MIT Press; drafts of articles concerning architecture and city and regional planning; and material concerning regional planning in Finland.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence between Spreiregen and Hans Blumenfeld, concerning publication of Blumenfeld's writings by MIT Press; drafts of articles written by Spreiregen for the American Institute of Architects, concerning architecture and city and regional planning; and material concerning regional planning in Finland.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Paul D. Spreiregen Papers, #3056. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box. Online guide unavailable.
